review: **** * ********* ****** ** *** I went with issue of mouth odor, and he just examined and gave consultation/ suggestions, without any intervention he solved my issue. After that went for a dental cleanup, he did it so well and painlessly. I am thoroughly impressed. Never have seen a doctor explaining so well and solving issues so spot on.

review:
Dr. Sambit is very nice friendly, he diagnosed my tooth problem in first visit & helped me getting relief from pain by the same day.
Dr.Sambit is very much recommend from my end because I visited many dental clinics before but was unable to get rid of the pain & problem which he resolved very fast.
Thank you doc, keep up the good work doing üëçüèºüòá
